messages.subject: One last banner
messages.msgSnippet: I m just not in the right frame of mind to write (dang it), so I m goofing off.  Though I haven t done anything with it or promoted it, maybe it would help to
messages.messageBody:
I'm just not in the right frame of mind to write (dang it), so I'm
goofing off. Though I haven't done anything with it or promoted it,
maybe it would help to have a banner for the lj, too, so... It's in
the Site Banners album.

Secretary, Wounds, Barb... use if you so desire (and if possible).

If I can't write, at least I can sit back and imagine, ne? :-P

phil
